thread.title: Olivia Culpo & Danny Amendola enjoy trip to Hawaii | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Olivia Culpo & Danny Amendola enjoy trip to Hawaii | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.Com
title: Olivia Culpo & Danny Amendola enjoy trip to Hawaii | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 88 shares Diving under the water off the popular vacation spit, Olivia surfaced and immediately grabbed hold of her muscle-bound beau. Wrapping her arms around his broad shoulders, the former Miss USA gave Danny a big kiss. Splish splash: The 24-year-old beauty queen and the 31-year-old Patriots player wasted no time getting into their swim gear and driving into the tropical waters off Maui Never letting go: The very handsome couple could not take their eyes - or their hands - off each other as they went for a dip While no doubt they could have stayed floating around in the warm water for a long time, the pair decided to get some winter sun and headed back up the beach. Walking out hand-in-hand the pair looked like they were modelling for a magazine shoot. For their day of love in the sun, Olivia showed off her lithe frame in an unusual bikini. Hot Hawaii: Diving under the water off the popular vacation spit, Olivia surfaced and immediately grabbed hold of her muscle-bound beau and gave him a big kiss Fun in the sun: While no doubt they could have stayed floating around in the warm water for a long time, the pair decided to get some winter sun and headed back up the beach Camera-ready pair: Walking out hand-in-hand the pair looked like they were modelling for a magazine shoot While most celebrities opt for barely-there two pieces, this fashion blogger went for something a little more covered. Her black swimsuit featured high-wasited bottoms with thick braided sides that showed glimpses of flesh. On the top, the style star wore a fixed triangle bikini which went over her shoulders rather than tying around her neck. Something different: For their day of love in the sun, Olivia showed off her lithe frame in an unusual bikini Doing it her way: While most celebrities opt for barely-there two pieces, this fashion blogger went for something a little more covered Style before sexy: Her black swimsuit featured high-wasited bottoms with thick braided sides that showed glimpses of flesh Keeping it simple: On the top, the style star wore a fixed triangle bikini which went over her shoulders rather than tying around her neck Olivia went without makeup but added a big pair of gold hoop earrings to the look. Danny matched his love's swim color scheme, wearing a pair of black shorts. The boardshorts were very short, ending halfway up the football star's thighs and were also rather tight. A bit of bling: Olivia went without makeup but added a pair of gold hoop earrings to the look Come on in: Later on in the day, Olivia got changed into another bikini as they relaxed at what appeared to be their private pool The wide receiver wore a pair of round framed sunglasses, even in the water. The holiday comes at a trying time for Danny, who is reportedly having to take a salary cut to stay with the New England Patriots so that the team can stay under the salary cap. The star has had this happen to him twice before and has been willing to do so as he loves his team so much. Couple coordinated: Danny matched his love's swim color scheme, wearing black shorts Working on those tan lines: The boardshorts were very short, ending halfway up the football star's thighs and were also rather tight So much shade: The wide receiver wore a pair of round framed sunglasses, even in the water The player currently earns a $6 million salary and gets $500,000 in per-game bonuses. But obviously he was not about to let that get in the way of some alone time with his love. Later on in the day, Olivia got changed into another bikini as they relaxed at what appeared to be their private pool. Team troubles: The holiday comes at a trying time for Danny, who is reportedly having to take a salary cut to stay with the New England Patriots so that the team can stay under the salary cap Dedicated: The star has had this happen to him twice before and has been willing to do so as he loves his team so much Getting close: The couple will soon mark their one year anniversary having first been linked in April of 2016 Posting a picture of herself in the pool, the model said: 'Come on i , the waters fine.' Olivia was watching on as Danny and his team fought back to win this year's Super Bowl earlier this month. Then Danny got a taste of her world last week when he walked in Philipp Plein's show at NYFW.
